title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - VelocityOne Flight - Using different joystick profiles
description:
In this video we will have a look at how to use the different profiles from the VelotityOne Flight joystick when using MSFS2020. We start with the joystick part and after that move on to the MSFS part.
